infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We use your camera so you can capture photos of your workouts and progress.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We access your photo library to let you upload progress photos and set a profile picture.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to track your runs and calculate distance, pace, and route.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We need your location to track your runs even when the app is in the background. This allows you to lock your phone or use other apps while recording your run.
